name: rxdb
description: A local-first realtime NoSQL Database for JavaScript applications - https://rxdb.info/
author: pubkey

scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:browser
scripts.// test:fast: run tests in the fast-mode. Most of them will run in parrallel, skips tests that are known slow
scripts.test:fast: npm run test:fast:memory && npm run test:fast:dexie
scripts.test:fast:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:memory-random-delay: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory-random-delay NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:foundationdb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=foundationdb NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:fast:mongodb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=mongodb NODE_ENV=fast mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.// test:fast:loop: runs tests in the fast-mode in a loop. Use this to debug tests that only fail sometimes
scripts.test:fast:loop: npm run test:fast && npm run test:fast:loop
scripts.test:fast:loop:memory: npm run test:fast:memory && npm run test:fast:loop:memory
scripts.test:fast:loop:dexie: npm run test:fast:dexie && npm run test:fast:loop:dexie
scripts.test:fast:loop:mongodb: npm run test:fast:mongodb && npm run test:fast:loop:mongodb
scripts.test:fast:loop:memory-random-delay: npm run test:fast:memory-random-delay && npm run test:fast:loop:memory-random-delay
scripts.test:node:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:memory-random-delay: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory-random-delay mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:sqlite-trial: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=sqlite-trial mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:localstorage: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=localstorage mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:bun:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie NODE_ENV=fast bun run ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test_tmp/unit.test.js --bail --timeout 60000
scripts.test:bun:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory NODE_ENV=fast bun run ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test_tmp/unit.test.js --bail --timeout 60000
scripts.test:deno:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie deno run --unstable --unstable-broadcast-channel --unstable-byonm --import-map=config/deno-import-map.json -A npm:mocha ./test/unit.test.ts --bail
scripts.test:deno:denokv: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=denokv deno run --unstable-kv --unstable-broadcast-channel --unstable-byonm --import-map=config/deno-import-map.json -A npm:mocha ./test/unit.test.ts --bail --timeout 150000
scripts.test:deno:denokv:loop: npm run test:deno:denokv && npm run test:deno:denokv:loop
scripts.test:deno:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory deno run --unstable --unstable-broadcast-channel --unstable-byonm --import-map=config/deno-import-map.json -A npm:mocha ./test/unit.test.ts --bail
scripts.test:node:foundationdb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=foundationdb mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:mongodb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=mongodb mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:mongodb:loop: npm run test:node:mongodb && npm run test:node:mongodb:loop
scripts.test:node:remote: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=remote mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js
scripts.test:node:remote:loop: npm run test:node:remote && npm run test:node:remote:loop
scripts.test:node:memory:loop: npm run test:node:memory && npm run test:node:memory:loop
scripts.test:node:dexie:loop: npm run test:node:dexie && npm run test:node:dexie:loop
scripts.test:node:foundationdb:loop: npm run test:node:foundationdb && npm run test:node:foundationdb:loop
scripts.test:node:custom: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/unit.test.js --experimental-sqlite
scripts.// test:node:loop: runs tests in node in a loop. Use this to debug tests that only fail sometimes
scripts.test:node:loop: npm run test:node && npm run test:node:loop
scripts.test:node:loop:memory-random-delay: npm run test:node:memory-random-delay && npm run test:node:loop:memory-random-delay
scripts.test:browser:loop: npm run test:browser && npm run test:browser:loop
scripts.test:browser:memory: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory  karma start ./config/karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:browser:localstorage: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=localstorage  karma start ./config/karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:browser:memory:loop: npm run test:browser:memory && npm run test:browser:memory:loop
scripts.test:browser:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie   karma start ./config/karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:browser:remote: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=remote karma start ./config/karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:browser:remote:loop: npm run test:browser:remote && npm run test:browser:remote:loop
scripts.test:browser:custom: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom  karma start ./config/karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:browser:custom:chromium: npm run transpile && cross-env CI=true DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom  karma start ./config/karma.conf.cjs --single-run --browsers Chromium
scripts.test:replication-firestore: npm run transpile && firebase emulators:exec "cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --expose-gc --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/replication-firestore.test.js" --only firestore --config "config/firestore.json" --project "rxdb-test"
scripts.test:replication-appwrite: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie karma start ./config/karma.appwrite.conf.cjs
scripts.test:replication-couchdb: npm run transpile && concurrently "npm run couch:start" "cross-env NATIVE_COUCHDB=5984 DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/replication-couchdb.test.js" --success first --kill-others
scripts.test:replication-nats: npm run transpile && concurrently "npm run nats:start" "cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/replication-nats.test.js" --success first --kill-others
scripts.test:replication-mongodb: node ./config/mongodb-connection-tester.js && npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/replication-mongodb.test.js
scripts.test:replication-supabase: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/replication-supabase.test.js
scripts.test:deps: npm run build && dependency-check ./package.json ./dist/cjs/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/validate-is-my-json-valid/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/attachments-compression/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/validate-ajv/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/update/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/key-compression/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/dev-mode/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/encryption-crypto-js/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/replication-graphql/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/replication-webrtc/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/replication-websocket/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/replication-firestore/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/replication-nats/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/validate-z-schema/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/storage-dexie/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/storage-memory/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/storage-mongodb/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/reactivity-vue/index.js ./dist/cjs/plugins/reactivity-preact-signals/index.js --no-dev --ignore-module util --ignore-module url --ignore-module ws --ignore-module graphql --ignore-module as-typed --ignore-module "@types/*"
scripts.test:circular: npm run build && madge --circular ./dist/esm/index.js && madge --circular ./dist/esm/plugins/storage-dexie/index.js && madge --circular test_tmp
scripts.test:performance:dexie: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=dexie CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:performance:memory:browser: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:performance:memory:node: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:memory:bun: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory bun run ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test_tmp/performance.test.js --bail
scripts.test:performance:memory:deno: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory deno run --unstable --allow-env --allow-read -A npm:mocha test/performance.test.ts --bail
scripts.test:performance:foundationdb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=foundationdb mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:mongodb: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=mongodb mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:performance:custom:browser: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom CI=true karma start ./config/karma.performance.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:performance:custom:node: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc --experimental-sqlite
scripts.test:performance: npm run build && npm run test:performance:dexie && npm run test:performance:memory:browser && npm run test:performance:memory:node
scripts.test:query-correctness-fuzzing:memory:no: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/query-correctness-fuzzing.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:query-correctness-fuzzing:custom:no: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=custom mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/query-correctness-fuzzing.test.js --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc
scripts.test:memory-leak:memory:node: npm run transpile && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/memory-leak.test.js --inspect --unhandled-rejections=strict --expose-gc --max-old-space-size=256
scripts.couch:start: docker run -p 5984:5984 -e COUCHDB_USER=root -e COUCHDB_PASSWORD=root --rm --name rxdb-couchdb couchdb:3.3.3
scripts.mongodb:start: docker run -p 27017:27017 -p 27018:27018 -p 27019:27019 --rm --name rxdb-mongodb mongo:8.0.4 mongod --replSet rs0 --bind_ip_all
scripts.profile: npm run transpile && rm -f isolate-* && cross-env DEFAULT_STORAGE=memory NODE_PROF=true mocha --config ./config/.mocharc.cjs ./test_tmp/performance.test.js --v8-prof --expose-gc && node scripts/profile.mjs
scripts.transpile: npm run build:version && node scripts/transpile.mjs && cp ./scripts/module_package.json test_tmp/package.json
scripts.build:esm: npm run build:version && rimraf -rf --max-retries=3 dist/esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=es6 babel src --out-dir dist/esm --source-maps --extensions ".ts,.js" && cp ./scripts/module_package_no_side.json dist/esm/package.json
scripts.build:types: npm run build:version && rimraf -rf --max-retries=3 ./dist/types && tsc --project ./config/tsconfig.types.json && cp -r ./src/types ./dist/types/types && node ./scripts/fix-types.mjs
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build:version && concurrently "npm run transpile" "npm run build:esm" "npm run build:types" "npm run build:plugins"
scripts.build:webpack: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=build webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.// docs:serve: start a local server to watch the docs. Served at http://localhost:4000/
scripts.docs:build: rimraf -rf ./docs && mkdir ./docs && (cd docs-src/ && npm run build) && cp -r ./docs-src/build/* ./docs && cp ./docs-src/CNAME ./docs/CNAME
scripts.disc: npm run transpile && npm run build:esm && cross-env NODE_ENV=disc webpack --config ./config/webpack.config.js
scripts.preversion: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.dev:example: watch 'npm run transpile:src && echo "done"' src/ test/
